## Source: amazon-inspector (3b977fbc50506142e7db68fc536bdfd96ccfa135ff0c03f3957d24b716cc4441)
The package silvermine was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (48fc132683cbda84aa98d77c10d2116dabdac6bc7598a5b60d2b25cb2374bd2e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'silvermine' @ 99.99.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
